title: Chapter 2597: It’S Still Beneath The Paper (3)
body:
Chapter 2597: It’S Still Beneath The Paper (3)

Chapter 2597: It’s Still Beneath the Paper (3)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

High up in the sky, Yu Zhiwen’s figure disappeared and was sealed in a piece of paper.

After he did all this, Zhu Yike smiled. He turned to look into the distance and took out a small copper coin from his pocket.

“Lord Shou, it’s still the same phrase…”

With a flick of his finger, the copper coin spun in the air and made a pleasant sound. He said.

“Do you want to jump?”

He wanted to show off to Jin Ren!

Old Zhu’s act of pretense could be said to be so natural!

Just as he was about to reply, he suddenly sensed that something was wrong and hurriedly said, “Be careful…”

It was too late!

The Sky Stealing technique had yet to take shape.

Zhu Yike sensed something at the same time and lowered his head to look at the paper that sealed Yu Zhiwen.

“Sizzle!”

The paper was ripped apart, and a translucent jade-white hand reached out and pierced through Zhu Yike’s heart.

“Oh!”

Zhu Yike grunted in disbelief.

Yu Zhiwen?

Impossible!

How could she break the spell on the Jumping Paper?

That hand was unwilling to let go. After it pierced through his chest, it tore upwards again!

“Sizzle…”

Zhu Yike’s heart was the first to be cut, followed by his left shoulder and neck. Even his head was almost cut in half on the spot.

If he had not tilted his head in time…

This hand blade slash could have destroyed his physical body!

It was also at this point that the paper was completely ripped apart. The hand that emerged from it stretched into the void and a person who wore a star-patterned gauze dress appeared… Dao Qiongcang!

This wasn’t Yu Zhiwen, but Elder Dao the Flamboyant!

Elder Dao smiled and raised his eyebrows in a coquettish manner at Zhu Yike. His tone was filled with heartfelt admiration as he answered the question that Lord Shou had never answered,

“Jump!”

Dao Qiongcang?

At this moment, not to mention Zhu Yike, even Jin Ren was dumbfounded.

Yu Zhiwen had turned into Dao Qiongcang?

When did this happen?

“How did you…”

Zhu Yike’s brain was about to explode.

He was the master of the Sky Stealing technique, but Elder Dao the Flamboyant’s stealing was even better than his!

“When she fainted earlier, for safety reasons, I had already transferred her away.” Dao Qiongcang seemed to know what the other party’s thoughts were and he explained calmly.

“Hiss…”

Only then did the intense pain hit him.

He couldn’t even suppress the shock in his mind.

Zhu Yike didn’t believe that this was a pre-arranged plan. Dao Qiongcang had moved Yu Zhiwen away and left behind a fake body?

“Impossible!”

Jin Ren said decisively.

His combat strength was gone, but he could see it clearly.

Yu Zhiwen had been under his feet from the beginning to the end, and the Qingyuan Mountain great array had not moved.

The person had not been removed at an earlier stage!

“Aiya, you’ve seen through me…”

Dao Qiongcang smiled in embarrassment, but his expression quickly turned serious again. He stared at Zhu Yike and said.

“Yes, I lied to you.”

“Actually, it was after you stole your Lord Shou, when your Lord Shou was unable to pay any attention to me…”

“I completed the transfer!”

When Zhu Yike heard this, he almost crashed.

Didn’t this mean that the moment he saved Lord Shou and left the battle situation, Elder Dao the Flamboyant had already calculated the ‘hostage’ part?

Jin Ren was momentarily stunned as he recalled that there was a moment when his spiritual senses had left Yu Zhiwen.

In an instant, he had goosebumps.

Qingyuan Mountain fell into deathly silence once again.

Zhu Yike’s face turned ashen.

Dao Qiongcang, who had just crawled out of the paper, clad in a dress, smiled.

“F*ck you!”

Zhu Yike cursed him soundly.

He swore that this was the most disgusting smile he had ever seen in his life.

The hostage holding was fruitless, and his injuries were severe. The situation took a turn for the worse, and it seemed there was no hope for survival…

Zhu Yike had not given up yet!

His eyes narrowed, and he pressed down on the wounds on his chest and left shoulder. With a whoosh, he threw himself at Dao Qiongcang.

“Reverse, Heaven and Earth reverse!”

With a sizzle, blood spurted out from the right side of Elder Dao’s chest and neck.

Zhu Yike’s injuries were like a mirror image, imprinted on Dao Qiongcang’s body!

As for himself, he had recovered totally and was completely unharmed!

“This…”

Dao Qiongcang looked down in shock, as if he was frightened by this move.

However, despite his shock, he did not hesitate at all. The divine Sinan shook, and starlight flashed.

“Great Killing Technique!”

At such a close distance, this attack could be said to have been launched instantly. Ordinary people would not be able to react in time.

Zhu Yike leaned back and released the Divine Puppet. His left hand reached into the Way of the Heavens and seemed to catch hold of the starlight.

His right hand gently pushed away the beam of light from the Great Killing Technique.

“Stars Shift and Battles Rage!”

This was an instant-cast spell!

The direction had changed…

The target had changed…

Locked on, error…

Dao Qiongcang only felt that he had exchanged positions with Zhu Yike, and he also felt that the Great Killing Technique had actually changed its direction.

In short, when he looked down, the beam of light that was meant to shoot at Zhu Yike had already pierced through his chest!

“Oh!”

Dao Qiongcang grunted. Blood seeped out from the corners of his lips, and his eyes were filled with shock.

“Jump?”

Zhu Yike grinned. His crooked teeth gleamed under the silver moon’s glow.

“I’ll let you jump!”

He flipped his hand and grabbed the Divine Puppet.

The copper coin that was stuck in his palm bounced up again.

“Ding!”

The sound was crisp and pleasant to the ears.

Zhu Yike didn’t get carried away with his momentary gain.

He knew that Elder Dao the Flamboyant had underestimated him and refused to unleash all his demi-saint’s might at once.

Otherwise, he had no chance of winning.

However, the result was the result. Reality was reality. He had won and Dao Qiongcang had lost.

If he had to do it again, he believed that Elder Dao the Flamboyant would never dare to underestimate him again.

Unfortunately, there were no ifs…

“Sky Stealing!”

Zhu Yike couldn’t suppress the smile on his face.

However, reality didn’t seem to be following his script?

The spell had already been cast, and he should have left Qingyuan Mountain. Why was he still at the same spot?

“Pfft…”

He felt a sharp pain in his abdomen.

Zhu Yike’s mouth opened and he spat out blood. He looked down in shock.

Previously, when Yu Zhiwen was sealed, it was actually Dao Qiongcang. When the paper tore and Elder Dao appeared, it seemed that the torn page had drifted away with the wind…

There was a corner!

At some point, it had gotten onto his clothes.

And now, a jade-white arm stretched out from it and pierced through Zhu Yike’s abdomen!

“Impossible…”

Zhu Yike used all his strength to raise his hand. He wanted to cover the injury to his energy reserve and move it away.

The hand rose again and stabbed into his chest. It then grabbed something.

“Bang bang…”

“Bang bang…”

A beating heart!

Dao Qiongcang crawled out from the last corner of the paper.

He looked at Zhu Yike, whose face was pale, and said with a smile.

“But, he did jump!”

“You made me look at you in a new light!”

Zhu Yike’s lips twitched. He could not say anything else. Once again, he was stunned.

Apart from him, Jin Ren’s consciousness that was inside the Divine Puppet looked at Dao Qiongcang, who was clad in a dress some distance away. He then looked at the second Dao Qiongcang that emerged from Zhu Yike’s body…

He was also stunned!

There were two Dao Qiongcangs?

Two demi-saint incarnations?

Was it necessary to use that to deal with himself?

“F*ck you…”

Zhu Yike cursed with difficulty. With a flip of his finger, he flicked out a section of his thumb.

However, Dao Qiongcang made his move in advance. He reached out, grabbed Zhu Yike’s fist and covered his knuckles.

He smiled and shook his head at Zhu Yike who was in his arms.

“It’s not elegant.”

He only gently clenched his heart.

Zhu Yike grunted, the spiritual source of his energy reserve collapsed, and his technique disappeared.

“F*ck you…”

“Oh!”

Dao Qiongcang withdrew his hand and stuffed his heart into this filthy mouth and stopped him from speaking.

He took out a weapon prohibition order from his pocket and slapped it on Zhu Yike.

The dust settled.

Zhu Yike’s eyes rolled up and his body went limp.

Dao Qiongcang stepped on this troublesome fellow and dropped him from the sky.

“Bang!”

Smoke and dust rose.

Elder Dao the Flamboyant no longer needed to care about the Golden Gate Stealing Technique. He smiled and looked at the Divine Puppet.

“Chat?”

Jin Ren’s spiritual senses that were in the puppet swept a glance at Elder Dao the Flamboyant of the Eight Classics and then at Elder Dao clad in a dress.

He was suddenly speechless and could not say anything.

“Bam!”

In mid-air, the Elder Dao that was clad in the dress transformed into a chubby Divine Elf.

It landed and pouted. It flew around Dao Qiongcang before it waved at the Divine Puppet.

“Xiaoshou, Xiaoshou, long time no see. I’m Xiao Qi. Do you remember me?”

Dao Qiongcang followed suit and looked over casually.

It was as if Zhu Yike’s resistance just now was just an illusion and nothing had happened. He still said the same thing.

“Chat?”
